channel.title: Disappointed with hidden hat achievement
channel.description:
[b][COLOR='Red']===SPOILER BELOW!===[/b][/SIZE]
I thought the hat will be found somewhere near the beginning in the game and that I'll have to transport it all the way through the game like the garden gnome in EP2, but it's located in crate in Lambda Core chapter. This would be much better and fun if we had to transport it ALL THE WAY, not just 5% of the game...

item.description:
bur:

the hat can be found in multiple places, i came across it twice

The second one is in one of the teleportation rooms in 247 puzzle (where you meet 2 scientists and a bodyguard) around some metal shelves over there. This hat looks identical to the first one, but you can’t unlock achievement with it.
